original_title: Public Security Min. hands over PCoI report on Easter Attacks to Catholic Church
original_body_lines: The complete report of the Presidential Commission to inquire the Easter Sunday terror attacks of 2019 has been handed over by the Minister of Public Security to the Chairman of the Catholic Bishop’s Conference.
Accordingly, the report was handed over to Rev. Fr. Harold Anthony Perera by Minister Tiran Alles on the approval of President Ranil Wickremesinghe.
